page.title: 12Community and social care.
page.content: {Dene Park}is a part 3 residential home for the aged.It was purpose built in 1979 and has 44 residents in 4 units.29 staff of social workers and domestics look after the family units The residents have their own room,or double room and share dayrooms. {St.Cuthbert's Close}is shelted accommodation for 49 people.There are 41 flats for single people or couples.A warden and assistant live there to look after tenants and see to their needs if necessary,but most are able to look after themselves and remain independent. It was built in 1971 on the site of an old church,and belongs to Tynedale District Council. {Haining Croft}since 1980 has been a home for adults with a mental handicap There are 24 residents aged 17 and over,who are encouraged to be part of the community and have an active life.
